name.en: Altar of the Twin Blaze Fiends
name.ja: <ruby>双<rt>そう</rt></ruby><ruby>焔<rt>えん</rt></ruby><ruby>魔<rt>ま</rt></ruby>の<ruby>祭<rt>さい</rt></ruby><ruby>壇<rt>だん</rt></ruby>

effect.en: Ritual Summon "Twin Blaze Fiend Angel Archel" or "Twin Blaze Fiend Angel Lunael" by sending Fiend Type monsters from your hand and/or field to the Graveyard whose total Levels equal 10 as material. Then, if you sent a monster in Maximum Mode to the Graveyard by this effect, while the monster Special Summoned by this effect is face-up, it gains 2000 ATK/DEF, and cannot be destroyed by card effects.
